column5: I had a friend ask me today if I knew any reputable musky guides in the kawartha area. Hes looking to suprise his son for his birthday. Any suggestions. Thanks,   Mike
garry2rs guides up there and can help you out send him a pm

This fella is a good guy to fish with so you may want to give him a try.  My picture is on his website but I have no affiliation with his company and have never hired him as a guide.  We used to fish together but just as friends and he's a good musky fisherman.  http://kawarthafishing.com/

Give my friend Brent a call he is great and you will have blast he is funny as hell and knows his stuff I know they will have a great time with Brent tell him I sent ya.  here is his facebook page he does not have his site totally done yet. http://www.facebook.com/pages/FISH-NV/175864882437212
Who did Saric use as a guide during his recent stay at Scotsman Point on Upper Buckhorn?
You can pm me or check me out at Www.fishing4tails.com I do Kawarthas and other areas .
